column5: Managed to get away from school on teh weekend for a 2 day hunt. Sunday at 730am i shot this doe walking right down the road to me. I took her at 25 yards with a slug from a 12 guage. She went about 15 feet.  About a half hour later i saw a small 6 point but he never presented a shot.     Saturday another guy dusted a spike with descent body size, and about 2 hours after my doe sunday, another fellow took a doe at about 10 feet. She almost ran him over at his watch with a hound right on her tail. The rest of the group is hunting until saturday this week and there is already 3 hanging. SHould a be a good week for them.  It was a pretty nice weekend to be out.    -R-
congrats on the doe should make for some tasty eats
Great job Ramble On  A real nice looking doe Thanks for sharing Leechman
Congrats on your 1st deer.  You will never forget that one.
Congrats on the first! Hopefully there will be plenty more to come....
Congradulations. A fine looking doe and I bet tasty too. Here's to you for carrying on a long tradition.
Way to go on the first deer. Got to love being part of the woods, and of course the whole hunt camp life for the time you get to be there. Enjoy eating her, will make some nice meat that's for sure
Now your in trouble-------your hooked---you'll be dreamin for tenderloins next year come the first red leaf  Congrats  Bushart
Congrats! Send me some pepperettes, lol
Congrats Ramble On.  I had to give up hunting because it cut into my fishing time.
congrats on getting your first, now your bank account is in real trouble, cause you always want more things to hunt with, fishermen/hunter is kinda like a smoker taking up chewing.   good job,  jason
